sections.title: Why build custom speech and text models?
sections.content:
In a world increasingly driven by voice interfaces, off-the-shelf speech-to-text (STT) and text-to-speech (TTS) solutions often fall short. They might lack the specific vocabulary for your industry, offer limited control over voice characteristics, or come with prohibitive per-usage costs.

Building your own custom voice AI on Kliv allows for unparalleled accuracy, naturalness, and flexibility. You can train models on your specific data, create unique voice profiles, and integrate seamlessly with your existing systems, all while maintaining control over costs and data privacy.

sections.title: The power of custom voice AI
sections.content:
## Limitations of generic voice AI

Many businesses rely on cloud-based STT/TTS APIs, but these often present challenges:

- **Domain-specific accuracy issues**: Generic models struggle with industry jargon, acronyms, and unique product names, leading to transcription errors.
- **Unnatural voice output**: Standard TTS voices can sound robotic, lack emotional nuance, and fail to match your brand's persona.
- **Cost scalability**: Per-minute or per-character pricing can become extremely expensive at scale, making high-volume applications unsustainable.
- **Data privacy concerns**: Sending sensitive audio or text data to third-party services can pose significant privacy and compliance risks.
- **Lack of customization**: Limited options for voice style, speed, pitch, or the ability to embed custom sounds or pauses.

## Why a custom-built solution is superior

Kliv empowers you to design and deploy bespoke voice AI systems that overcome these limitations:

### Unrivaled accuracy
Train your STT models with your own audio data, specific vocabulary, and accents. Achieve industry-leading transcription accuracy for your unique use case, from medical dictation to technical support calls.

### Brand-aligned voice synthesis
Develop custom TTS voices that match your brand's identity, tone, and desired emotional range. Create unique personas for virtual assistants, audiobook narration, or marketing content.

### Cost control and predictability
Shift from variable per-usage fees to a predictable infrastructure cost. Optimize models for efficiency and run them on hardware you control, eliminating unexpected invoices.

### Enhanced data security
Keep your sensitive audio and text data within your own secure environment. Maintain full control over privacy and comply with strict regulatory requirements without relying on third parties.

### Seamless integration
Design your STT/TTS solution to integrate perfectly with your existing applications, workflows, and databases. No more wrestling with rigid API constraints or data format mismatches.

### Adaptability and evolution
Your custom voice AI can evolve with your business. Easily update models with new data, fine-tune performance, or add new capabilities as your needs change, without vendor lock-in.

## Real-world applications

Custom STT/TTS solutions are revolutionizing various sectors:

**Healthcare**: Accurate medical dictation for diagnoses, real-time transcription of patient consultations, and synthesis of patient education materials in multiple languages.

**Customer Service**: Real-time call transcription for agent assistance, automated sentiment analysis, and intelligent voicebots providing natural customer interactions.

**Education**: Interactive learning platforms with accurate lecture transcription, personalized pronunciation feedback, and audio lessons generated on the fly.

**Media & Entertainment**: Automated captioning and subtitling, voiceovers for video content, and dynamic audiobook narration with expressive voices.

**Automotive**: In-car voice assistants with personalized accents and optimized speech recognition for noisy environments.

## The Kliv advantage for voice AI

Building sophisticated voice AI used to require deep expertise in machine learning and linguistics. Kliv simplifies this process:

- **Intuitive model training**: Guide the AI to build and optimize your STT/TTS models.
- **Rapid prototyping**: Test different voice profiles and transcription accuracies quickly.
- **Performance tuning**: AI assists in fine-tuning models for speed, accuracy, and resource efficiency.
- **Deployment flexibility**: Deploy your models on-premises, in the cloud, or even at the edge.

Take control of your voice strategy. With Kliv, you can create a voice experience that truly stands out—accurate, natural, and uniquely yours.

items.answer: Building complex voice AI solutions used to take months or years. With Kliv's AI-assisted development, you can create a functional STT/TTS application within days or even hours, allowing for rapid iteration and deployment.
items.question: How quickly can I build a custom voice AI application with Kliv?

items.answer: While some understanding of your specific vocal data (e.g., industry jargon, accents) is helpful, Kliv's platform and AI tools minimize the need for deep coding or machine learning expertise. You focus on describing your desired outcome; the AI helps build it.
items.question: Do I need machine learning or heavy coding skills to use Kliv for voice AI?

items.answer: Yes, custom voice AI applications built with Kliv can be deployed in various environments: on-premises for maximum data control, in a private cloud, or to edge devices for low-latency, offline capabilities, depending on your prompt and requirements.
items.question: Can these custom voice AI models be deployed on-premises or at the edge?

items.answer: You own 100% of the intellectual property, including your custom models and generated code. Kliv is a platform for creation, not a proprietary service that locks you in.
items.question: Who owns the voice models and applications I build using Kliv?

items.answer: Absolutely. Custom-built solutions offer superior data privacy and security because you control the data pipeline, storage, and processing. You can choose to process sensitive audio and text data within your own secure, compliant infrastructure.
items.question: Is building my own voice AI more secure than using third-party APIs?

items.answer: Costs are primarily associated with the development effort and the infrastructure you choose for deployment. Unlike per-minute or per-character pricing of many cloud services, custom solutions offer predictable, often lower, long-term operational costs at scale.
items.question: How do the costs compare to using existing large-scale voice API providers?

items.answer: Yes, a core advantage of custom AI is continuous improvement. You can feed new audio data back into your STT models to further reduce error rates or update TTS voices with new speech samples to refine their naturalness as your needs evolve.
